tasks.title: Setup Project Structure
tasks.description: Initialize the Next.js project with the required dependencies and folder structure.
tasks.details: Use 'npx create-next-app' to create the Next.js app. Install necessary packages: shadcn/ui, Prisma, BetterAuth, and NestJS. Set up the folder structure for components, pages, and API routes.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the project builds successfully and that the initial page renders without errors.

subtasks.title: Initialize Next.js Application
subtasks.description: Use npx create-next-app to scaffold the Next.js application structure
subtasks.details: Run 'npx create-next-app client-automation-app' to initialize the Next.js project with TypeScript support. Configure the project with appropriate settings for a modern web application.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the Next.js development server starts and the initial page renders without errors

subtasks.title: Install Required Dependencies
subtasks.description: Install and configure required packages for the application
subtasks.details: Install the necessary dependencies: shadcn/ui for UI components, Prisma for database ORM, BetterAuth for authentication, and NestJS for the backend API. Configure package.json with appropriate versions and scripts.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check that all packages are properly installed and accessible in the project

subtasks.title: Create Project Folder Structure
subtasks.description: Create the initial folder structure for organized development
subtasks.details: Set up the folder structure with dedicated directories: /components for UI components, /pages for Next.js pages, /api for API routes, /lib for utility functions, /styles for CSS/styling, and /types for TypeScript interfaces. Ensure proper separation of concerns.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify the folder structure exists and files can be created in each directory

subtasks.title: Configure Development Tools
subtasks.description: Configure ESLint, Prettier, and TypeScript settings
subtasks.details: Set up development tools including ESLint configuration for code quality, Prettier for code formatting, and TypeScript configuration. Create appropriate config files and ensure they work together seamlessly.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test that linting and formatting work correctly on sample code

subtasks.title: Configure Environment Variables and Settings
subtasks.description: Set up environment variables and basic configuration
subtasks.details: Create .env.local template with required environment variables, set up configuration files for database connection, authentication settings, and API endpoints. Ensure proper environment variable loading in both development and production.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that environment variables are properly loaded and accessible in the application

tasks.title: Implement Authentication with BetterAuth
tasks.description: Integrate BetterAuth for user authentication using passkeys.
tasks.details: Follow BetterAuth documentation to set up authentication. Use the Prisma Adapter for managing user sessions and roles. Ensure secure session handling with WebAuthn.
tasks.testStrategy: Test user registration and login flows, ensuring that passkeys work correctly and sessions are secure.

tasks.title: Create Database Schema
tasks.description: Define the PostgreSQL database schema using Prisma for clients, projects, tasks, automations, services, and users.
tasks.details: Create a Prisma schema file with models for Client, Project, Task, Automation, Service, and User as per the PRD. Use JSONB for storing automation data.
tasks.testStrategy: Run Prisma migrations and verify that the database tables are created correctly.

tasks.title: Develop CRUD Operations for Clients
tasks.description: Implement Create, Read, Update, Delete operations for managing clients.
tasks.details: Use NestJS to create a REST API for clients. Implement endpoints for adding, retrieving, updating, and deleting client records.
tasks.testStrategy: Write unit tests for each endpoint to ensure they function correctly and handle edge cases.

tasks.title: Develop CRUD Operations for Projects
tasks.description: Implement CRUD operations for managing projects linked to clients.
tasks.details: Extend the NestJS API to include endpoints for projects. Ensure that projects can be associated with clients and services.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the project endpoints with various scenarios, ensuring proper linking to clients.

tasks.title: Implement Task Manager Functionality
tasks.description: Create a Kanban-style task manager for assigning and managing tasks.
tasks.details: Develop a frontend component using Next.js to display tasks in a Kanban format. Integrate with the backend to fetch and update task statuses.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct user testing to ensure tasks can be created, assigned, and moved between statuses.

tasks.title: Integrate n8n Automation Storage
tasks.description: Implement functionality to store and manage n8n automation JSON data.
tasks.details: Create an API endpoint to accept JSON data for automations and link them to projects or clients. Store this data in the JSONB column of the database.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the API with various JSON inputs to ensure data is stored and retrieved correctly.

tasks.title: Develop Dashboard Overview
tasks.description: Create a dashboard to provide an overview of clients, ongoing projects, tasks, and recent automations.
tasks.details: Use Next.js to build a dashboard component that aggregates data from clients, projects, tasks, and automations. Ensure it updates in real-time.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform integration testing to ensure all data is displayed correctly and updates as expected.

tasks.title: Implement User Role Management
tasks.description: Set up user roles and permissions for the admin and founder.
tasks.details: Implement role-based access control in the application, ensuring that the founder has full access while admins have limited permissions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test role assignments and access restrictions to ensure proper functionality.

tasks.title: Finalize MVP and Documentation
tasks.description: Prepare the application for MVP release, including documentation and user guides.
tasks.details: Compile documentation for the API, user guides for the application, and prepare deployment instructions.
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation for clarity and completeness, and conduct a final walkthrough of the application.
